item.title: The Long, Charged History of the “Woody Allen Font”
item.description: Popping up in the latest Luca Guadagnino film, the typeface was Allen’s signature — until dark allegations turned it into a visual statement.

item.title: Joe Caroff, Designer of the James Bond 007 Logo, Dies at 103
item.description: He also worked on iconic posters for ‘West Side Story,’ ‘A Hard Day’s Night,’ ‘Last Tango in Paris,’ ‘Cabaret,’ ‘Manhattan’ and ‘The Last Temptation of Christ.’

item.description: He also worked on iconic posters for ‘West Side Story,’ ‘A Hard Day’s Night,’ ‘Last Tango in Paris,’ ‘Cabaret,’ ‘Manhattan’ and ‘The Last Temptation of Christ.’

item.title: Woody Allen Compared Jeffrey Epstein to Dracula in Birthday Letter
item.description: The New York Times, in a story about the late convicted sex offender’s lavish Upper East Side mansion includes a letter sent by the disgraced filmmaker to the financier for his 63rd birthday in 2016.

item.title: Scott MacDonough, Unit Publicist on ‘Annie Hall’ and ‘Norma Rae,’ Dies at 81
item.description: He also helped get the early word out about ‘Chapter Two,’ ‘Diner’ and ‘Stanley & Iris’ during his career.
